note: Doug is Creative, Adventurous, Thoughtful, and Kind - is Son of two loving parents and a big brother - Lover of Art, Photography, and Nature - Who feels calm, collected, and driven to succeed - Who needs love, laughter, and good times with friends - Who gives good hugs, helping hands, and sound advice to those in need - Who fears spiders, poisonous snakes, and grizzly bears - Who Dreams of World Peace - Hiding Out in Las Vegas, NV - Glass
